sameAnalysis.part_name: 这两个动词均含"装饰"之意。
means: decorate ： 普通用词，指对人或物进行装饰，使之更加完美。
ornament ： 指装饰以精美之物，使某处或某物增添美丽的或景色。

sentence.Network_en: The clock is simply for ornament; it doesn't work any more.
sentence.Network_cn: 这架时钟纯属摆设，它再也不走了。

sentence.Network_en: The flowers were put on the table for ornament.
sentence.Network_cn: 花放在桌子上做装饰用.

sentence.Network_en: The baroque style is rich in ornament.
sentence.Network_cn: 巴罗克风格极具装饰性.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (also in the sense accessory): from Old French ournement, from Latin ornamentum 'equipment, ornament', from ornare 'adorn'. The verb dates from the early 18th cent

entry.tran: （家中或花园里的）装饰物，装饰品，点缀品
entry.def: An ornament is an attractive object that you display in your home or in your garden.

example.ex: ...a shelf containing a few photographs and ornaments.
example.tran: 摆放着几张照片和些许装饰品的架子

entry.def: Pieces of jewellery are sometimes referred to as ornaments .

example.ex: I guessed he was the chief because he wore more gold ornaments than the others.
example.tran: 我估计他是酋长，因为他戴的金饰最多。

entry.tran: （建筑或家具的）装饰物，装饰图案
entry.def: Decorations and patterns on a building or a piece of furniture can be referred to as ornament .

means.word_mean: 1. make more attractive by adding ornament, colour, etc.;

auth_sentence.content: A very simple style of dress, devoid of ornament or pretension.
auth_sentence.res_content: A very simple style of dress, devoid of ornament or pretension.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A very simple style of dress, devoid of ornament or pretension.

auth_sentence.content: He was obviously trained in the intricate interlace work of eleventh-century ornament.
auth_sentence.res_content: He was obviously trained in the intricate interlace work of eleventh-century ornament.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He was obviously trained in the intricate interlace work of eleventh-century ornament.

auth_sentence.content: "You and that lawn ornament," my mom would say.
auth_sentence.res_content: "You and that lawn ornament," my mom would say.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "You and that lawn ornament," my mom would say.

stems_affixes.value_cn: 不加修饰的,[文体等]朴素的
stems_affixes.word_buile: in不+ornate充满装饰的→不装饰的
orn装饰+ate……的→adj.华美的,充满装饰的
sub在下面+orn装饰→在下面装饰[别人]→贿赂

sentences.en: The flowers were put on the table for ornament.
sentences.cn: 花放在桌子上做装饰用。

sentences.en: There's a lot ornaments on the wall.
The room was full of pictures and other beautiful ornaments.
sentences.cn: 这个房间布满了图画和其他漂亮的装饰品。

means.word_mean: 装饰, 点缀, 美化

sentences.en: They are ornamenting a Christmas tree.
